Description: Welcome to Beacon Hill's hidden gem! This renovated 1 bedroom plus office apartment exudes elegance and offers a sophisticated urban retreat. Step inside and be captivated by the European-inspired kitchen and bath, showcasing modern design and top-notch finishes. With the convenience of in-unit laundry and central AC, comfort and functionality are at your fingertips. Take advantage of the rare opportunity of no broker fee and indulge in June rent-free. Don't miss out on this exceptional living experience in one of Boston's most prestigious neighborhoods. 73120 224
